title: Employee Directory
descriptionURL: Employee Directory is an app which displays employees and their basic contact information. Users can search and sort employees.

title: Bird Brains
descriptionURL: Online community for bird watchers which gamifies the hobby by awarding points for each bird sighting.

title: Burger logger
descriptionURL: App for building and eating burgers using handlebars

title: Employee Management Tool
descriptionURL: Command Line Interface Human Resources program for tracking employees, managers, roles, and departments.

title: Digital Coffee
descriptionURL: Homepage providing internet users with a positive quotes and images in a clean UI/UX.

title: JavaScript Trivia Game
descriptionURL: Users race the clock to set new high scores while being quizzed on their knowledge of Javascript through a series of multiple choice questions.

title: Weather Dashboard
descriptionURL: Displays current weather conditions and the 5 day forecast user requested locations
